usage: resistance training and strength training exercises
key_features: Made of solid high-quality cast iron
Painted surface for increased durability and corrosion protection
Textured wide handle for comfortable, secure grip
Accurate weight as per international standards
Suitable for a wide range of resistance-training exercises
ai_description: A solid black cast iron kettlebell with a spherical body and wide, textured handle. The weight '6KG' is prominently embossed on the front/side of the bell. The surface has a painted, textured finish that appears durable. The kettlebell features a flat base for stability and a seamless handle design for comfortable gripping. Displayed against a clean white background, the product appears new and ready for use.
product_name: Amazon Basics Kettlebell - Cast Iron Resistance Training Weight with Textured Wide Grip Handle - Painted Finish - Black
manual: Professionally crafted kettlebell made from 100% pure cast iron with no material mixing, delivering long-term durability and accurate weight as per international standards. The smooth, seamless cast-iron handle offers a secure, comfortable grip, while the flat, well-balanced base ensures superior ground stability, controlled movements, and safe strength training for both beginners and advanced athletes
